ProfileHeader.fullStackEngineer: Full-stack engineer specializing in frontend architecture and blockchain integrations | Software Engineer | Technology leadership | Web3 | React, React-Router, Preact, Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind, IPFS, Ether, EVM, Wagmi, Viem | Fixing your vibe code
ProfileHeader.location: Greater Foggia Metropolitan Area, Apulia, Italy

About.title: About
About.firstParagraph: Software engineer with over 20 years of front-end experience, 5 years in Web3, and hands-on full-stack and AI agent integration expertise.
About.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: If you're thinking of offering me a long-term contract, please send a request here or via email at hello@rocco.me
About.fullStackDeveloper: I design, refactor, and ship products that merge blockchain transparency with real user value, from DeFi and RWA platforms to secure browser extensions and gamified apps. I lead small agile teams with a focus on mentorship, code quality, long-term sustainability and not just delivery speed.
About.currentlyWorking: Currently working as Lead Software Engineer at The Web3 Ninja, where I mentor developers, build full-stack blockchain integrations for DApps and Web2 apps, and optimize API communication to improve speed and reduce gas costs.
About.lastParagraph: I write code. I build systems. I work in Web3, AI, and Cybersecurity. I mentor junior devs and career changers. From South Italy to the globe, I develop decentralized applications (DApps) that redefine user experiences: tokenized assets, DeFi platforms, and smart contract integrations. My recent projects have delivered millions in liquidity, supported 5M+ monthly users with 3k concurrent, and achieved significant improvements in code quality and team productivity.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.ledFrontendDevelopment: Mentored 5 developers; placed 3 in junior roles. Built full-stack blockchain integrations for 3 DApps and Web2 apps. Optimized API communication, improving speed by 15% and cutting gas costs.
Experience.developedInteractiveUI: Delivered UI for Lotsalootâ„¢, a three-tier jackpot system. Designed a fast-hitting reward loop to maximize engagement. Strengthened jackpot portfolios with consistent micro-reward feedback.
Experience.createdDashboardInterfaces: Led a 12-member team, achieving a 30% productivity boost. Reduced bugs by 25% and raised code quality 40%. Supported 5M monthly users with 3k concurrent.
Experience.highUserEngagementDesc: Led development of widely used platforms and applications.
Experience.majorRefactoringDesc: Improved code efficiency and reduced technical debt at iControlApp.
Experience.defiDappLaunchDesc: Reduced bugs by 25% and implemented better workflows and code standards.
Experience.improvedCodeQualityDesc: Provided mentorship and career guidance to junior developers.
Experience.boostedProductivityDesc: Created development standards for better code quality and consistency.
Experience.designConsistencyDesc: Built open-source tools to protect users from phishing and fraud.
Experience.addYourWorkExperience: Add your work experience to help others find you.
Experience.ledFrontendDevelopmentFull: Led frontend development for multiple client projects. Implemented responsive UI designs and optimized web performance. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Experience.developedInteractiveUIFull: Developed interactive user interfaces using React and modern CSS frameworks. Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect components and animations. Built reusable component libraries and maintained design systems.
Experience.createdDashboardInterfacesFull: Created dashboard interfaces for security monitoring tools. Worked with backend team to integrate APIs and real-time data visualization components. Implemented security best practices in frontend development.
Experience.providedWebDevelopmentServices: Provided web development services to small and medium businesses. Built custom websites and web applications using modern technologies. Managed client relationships and project timelines.

Recommendations.title: Recommendations
Recommendations.workedWith: {name} worked with {person} in the same team
Recommendations.exceptionalDeveloper: Rocco is an exceptional frontend developer with a keen eye for detail and a talent for creating elegant user interfaces. His ability to translate complex requirements into intuitive designs is remarkable. He consistently delivered high-quality code on our shared projects and was always willing to help others on the team.

Volunteering.title: Volunteering
Volunteering.helpingPeers: So far I have been helping around ~12 peers, 5 got a position in first 1~4 months.
Volunteering.helpedCareerSwitch: I even helped a 32 yrs old in his job switch career.
Volunteering.positionedInterns: And I positioned 2 interns, last year (middle 2023), to their first junior positions.
Volunteering.gettingBetter: So I'm getting better at it. But oftentimes it also depends on the person and how much motivated is.
Volunteering.dedicatingTime: I'm dedicating part of my day to help people in need around Africa and the Middle East with crowdfunding/fundraisings initiatives.
